sentences.en: Endue him with blessings, and send him your peace.
sentences.cn: 祈神保佑, 让他安宁吧.

sentences.en: He prayed to God night and day endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.cn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心。

sentences.en: He prayed to God night and day to endue him with the spirit of holiness.
sentences.cn: 他日夜祈求上帝赋予他虔敬的心.

sentences.en: He prayed to God to endue him with wisdom.
sentences.cn: 他祈求上帝赋予他智慧.

sentences.en: The society endues us the mission , and the clients endue us the responsibility !
sentences.cn: 社会赋予我们使命，客户赋予我们责任！

sentences.en: The value of life is up to the ultimate mission you endue with yourself .
sentences.cn: 生命的价值取决于你赋予自己的终极使命。

sentences.en: What weapons to select, what armour to endue.
sentences.cn: 选择精良的武器, 穿上合适的盔甲.

trans.tran_cn: 穿上, 授予, 赋予
trans.tran_en: to invest or provide, as with some quality or trait
